channel.title: Order of operations
channel.description:
From what I have read this game doesn't have a proper order of things resolving. Sometimes it does but othertimes it doesn't. If there isn't then here is my suggestion:
0: Check who Everyone is targeting 1. Jail 2. Day Ability's that resolve at night 3: Ice ward/Hide/Wall of fire targeting self 4. Check if any occupiers are targeting the Merc/sage 5. If not then stand guard/wall of fire 6. Happy hour 7: Execute 8: Butler/Servant and Poacher 9: Invoker Occupy 10: Willo-wisp 11: Tornado 12: Teleport 13: Debauchery 14: Invoker redirect 15: Tailor Ability's 16: Frame Ability's/Defile 17: Investigative Ability's 18: Knight Sacrifice 19: King Guard 20: Hunter Bear 21: Reaper attack 22: Heals 23: Hunter wolf 24: Other attacks 26: Possession 27: Reanimate 28: Conversions

item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
From what I have read this game doesn’t have a proper order of things resolving. Sometimes it does but othertimes it doesn’t. If there isn’t then here is my suggestion:

0: Check who Everyone is targeting

  1. Jail
  2. Day Ability’s that resolve at night
    3: Ice ward/Hide/Wall of fire targeting self
  3. Check if any occupiers are targeting the Merc/sage
  4. If not then stand guard/wall of fire
